main event: An observer reported a sighting of a star-like light near Greenville, Ohio, that changed colors from red to white and disappeared below the horizon.
interesting points: The observer described the light as a very bright flashing object,The sighting lasted approximately 3 seconds,The observer stated that they had no previous experience seeing such a phenomenon,The object was reported to not resemble a conventional aircraft, and it was reported to be larger and brighter than a star or planet.
witness description: 17-year-old male student with observable knowledge of aviation and astronomy.
